translation.en: Getting an early start on lunch?
Nope. I'm working on something new, butternut squash risotto for Christmas.
translation.es: No. Estoy trabajando en algo nuevo. Risotto de calabaza para Navidad.

translation.en: It sounds delicious.
Tried it last night, but the ingredient ratios were all messed up.
translation.es: Lo intenté anoche, pero calculé mal los ingredientes.

translation.en: Keep getting distracted.
By what?
So I'm partway through this painting, and I was finishing it in my head now.
translation.es: Voy a mitad de un cuadro e intento terminarlo en mi mente.

translation.en: You can't let your painting be the cause of wasted food.
translation.es: Tu cuadro no debe hacerte desperdiciar comida.

translation.en: Right.
How would you like to rustle us up some breakfast?
Can you make your father's smoked salmon scrambled eggs?
translation.es: ¿Los huevos revueltos con salmón de tu padre?

translation.en: I can. Can't make it as well as he did, though.
translation.es: Claro, pero no me quedan tan bien como a él.

translation.en: Yes, you can.
Your father would be so proud of you
the way you've just stepped in and made this restaurant your own.
translation.es: de cómo te pusiste al frente del restaurante.

translation.en: Smoked salmon it is.
You should paint a picture of yourself to go with your picture of your father.
translation.es: Pinta tu autorretrato y cuélgalo junto al de tu padre.

translation.en: I don't think so.
I didn't even want you to put up the photograph of me.
translation.es: Ni siquiera quería que pusieras mi foto.

translation.en: I'm no equal of Dad. And it's pretty apparent that the customers agree.
translation.es: No estoy a la altura de papá. Y es obvio que los clientes opinan igual.

translation.en: Stop that.
It's getting steadily better, and Christmas is always great for us.
translation.es: Cada vez va mejor y siempre nos va muy bien en Navidad.

translation.en: Oh, I got to go to town and meet Ella to take care of something.
translation.es: Debo ir al centro con Ella por un asunto.

translation.en: - I'll be back for lunch service. - Just come back in time for Ella's shift.
translation.es: - Vendré para el almuerzo. - Vuelve para el turno de Ella.

translation.en: The staff can look after the kitchen for lunch. Have fun!
translation.es: El personal puede ocuparse de la cocina. Diviértete.

translation.en: Thanks.
Why are we here?
This is my happy place. You okay? The walls are empty.
translation.es: - Aquí me siento feliz. - ¿Estás bien? Las paredes están vacías.

translation.en: Yeah, but can't you feel the artist creating art for the contest?
translation.es: Sí, pero ¿no sientes la energía creativa de los artistas?

translation.en: If you say so.
You love creating dishes. That's your art.
translation.es: Amas crear platillos. Ese es tu arte.

translation.en: I mean, I do too, but…
- You think I'm a good chef? - You're terrific.
Then why is this my happy place?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué aquí me siento feliz?

translation.en: Because you have a soul of a painter.
Soul of a painter?
Okay, I saw it in a movie, but it fit the moment, didn't it?
translation.es: Lo escuché en una película, pero aplica, ¿no?

translation.en: So where's your happy place? You know, the restaurant.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde te sientes feliz? - Ya lo sabes. En el restaurante.

translation.en: The day you moved me from desserts to sous chef
translation.es: El día que me pasaste de postres a sous-chef

translation.en: was the second best day of my life.
translation.es: fue el segundo mejor día de mi vida.

translation.en: Well, I'm sure your husband would be happy to hear he beat sous chef.
translation.es: Seguro tu esposo estará feliz de ser más importante que ser sous-chef.

translation.en: Gabe supports my dreams. You need someone like that.
translation.es: Gabe apoya mis sueños. Necesitas a alguien así.

translation.en: After the disaster that was Jeff, I'm fine alone.
translation.es: Después del desastre que fue con Jeff, estoy bien sola.

translation.en: And I have a lot going on.
I started painting again.
Well then…
you need to submit to the art festival.
- That's why we're here. - Consider me shocked.
I took over the restaurant about a year ago,
translation.es: Hace un año que dirijo el restaurante

translation.en: and Mom said it's starting to come back, so I thought, Why not?
translation.es: y mamá dice que va muy bien, así que dije: ¿Por qué no?.

translation.en: Do you ever wonder what would have happened
if you went straight to art school after graduation
translation.es: si hubieras ido a Bellas Artes después de graduarte

translation.en: rather than sticking around the restaurant?
translation.es: en lugar de estar en el restaurante?

translation.en: Well, Charlie's Kitchen isn't just a restaurant. It's my family's lifeblood.
translation.es: No es solo un restaurante. Es la vida de mi familia.

translation.en: I can never leave it behind. Especially now.
If you're looking for support,
I absolutely believe you could win this art competition.
translation.es: sé que puedes ganar este concurso de arte.

translation.en: Come on! You know it's true!
I started something.
It's very Christmas- y.
No, no, wait. I have a better idea. You could paint me.
translation.es: Espera, se me ocurre algo mejor. Podrías pintarme a mí.

translation.en: I look very cute in Christmas outfits.
translation.es: Me veo muy bonita en trajes navideños.

translation.en: I'll definitely win then. Absolutely. That's a great idea.
translation.es: Triunfo asegurado. Totalmente. Muy buena idea.

translation.en: - You should've told me this days ago. - I have all the good ideas.
translation.es: - Debiste decirlo antes. - Siempre tengo buenas ideas.

translation.en: Knock knock.
David.
You were supposed to call me when you got in so I could pick you up.
translation.es: Dijiste que me llamarías cuando llegaras para ir a buscarte.

translation.en: I just grabbed a rideshare. It was easier than bothering you.
translation.es: Tomé un taxi. Era más fácil que molestarte.

translation.en: - Ooh! - Good to see ya.
Having you here for Christmas is, like, the best thing ever.
translation.es: Tenerte aquí en Navidad es lo mejor del mundo.

translation.en: It's a double win for me.
I get to see your new place and spend the holidays with you.
translation.es: conozco tu nueva casa y paso las fiestas contigo.

translation.en: - Mm. - Bayside is a big change from New York.
translation.es: Bayside es muy distinto de Nueva York.

translation.en: Yeah, and that's exactly how we like it.
translation.es: Sí, y nos gusta que así sea.

translation.en: Hey, I hope you're okay with this whole garage vibe.
translation.es: Espero que no te moleste la onda del garaje.

translation.en: - No. - You know, I hope this works. It's different from what you're used to but--
translation.es: Ojalá te guste. Es distinto a lo que estás acostumbrado.

translation.en: Works for me. I started out in the garage.
translation.es: Me gusta. Yo empecé en el garaje.

translation.en: One more picture to finish and then I'm yours until the next corporation calls.
translation.es: Solo me falta terminar un dibujo y seré todo tuyo.

translation.en: Score. Oh, hey.
I actually kept my old sketching desk from our days in New York.
translation.es: Conservé mi vieja mesa de dibujo de nuestra época en Nueva York.

translation.en: And don't worry. Your original masterpiece is still intact.
translation.es: Y no te preocupes, tu obra maestra original sigue intacta.

translation.en: Wow.
Look at that. A stone- age cave drawing.
translation.es: Mira eso. Un dibujo de la Edad de Piedra.

translation.en: Whoa! This is a Wyatt Graham original. How much do you think I could get for it?
translation.es: Un momento, es un Wyatt Graham original. ¿Cuánto crees que me darían por él?

translation.en: My originals are computer- generated these days,
translation.es: Hoy todo se genera por computadora.

translation.en: so unless we can find a hotel lobby this will work in,
translation.es: A menos que lo quieran para el vestíbulo de un hotel,

translation.en: I don't think anyone's going to be interested, but enough about me, come on.
translation.es: no creo que le interese a nadie, pero basta de mí.

translation.en: Yeah, not quite.
Cheryl is going to need a lot more, and she's definitely going to ask about Michelle.
translation.es: Cheryl querrá saber más de ti y seguro te va a preguntar por Michelle.

translation.en: And I'm going to tell her what I tell everyone else.
translation.es: Y le diré lo mismo que a todos los demás.

translation.en: She wanted to settle down. I wasn't ready.
translation.es: Ella quería sentar cabeza, yo no estaba listo.

translation.en: Not ready to stop traveling?
I love the places I get to go.
I'm just… I'm not artistically satisfied.
translation.es: Es solo que artísticamente no me siento satisfecho.

translation.en: I used to use pencils to create my drawings and now everything is computer- generated.
translation.es: Hacía mis dibujos con lápices y ahora todo es generado por computadora.

translation.en: There's no human element to the finished product anymore.
translation.es: Falta el elemento humano en el producto final.

translation.en: I get it, and so…
I've gone ahead and done something.
What did you do?
I have entered you in the City Christmas Art Festival.
translation.es: Te inscribí en el festival de arte navideño.

translation.en: - Hmm. - So it's time to put up or get mad at me.
translation.es: O participas o te enojas conmigo.

translation.en: Or maybe… maybe thank you.
translation.es: O tal vez te lo agradezca.

translation.en: Hey, what are friends for?
The contest is Christmas- themed. So I was thinking, hey, you know, you could just enter this,
translation.es: El tema del concurso es la Navidad y se me ocurrió que puedes presentar este.

translation.en: and then you don't have to create anything new.
translation.es: No tendrás que crear uno nuevo.

translation.en: Nah, no way. It's a lot to process, but I love a challenge.
translation.es: De ninguna manera. Es todo un proceso, pero me gustan los desafíos.

translation.en: And, hey, it could be fun.
All right. I'll need supplies.
I got you covered on that. There's a shop downtown.
translation.es: Arreglado. Hay una tienda en el centro.

translation.en: - Perfect. - Let's go get some food.
Okay.
I got this.
- Hey, welcome back. - I just came in to drop Ella off.
translation.es: - Bienvenida. - Solo vine a dejar a Ella.

translation.en: I forgot my work shoes so I need to go home.
translation.es: Dejé los zapatos. Debo ir a casa.

translation.en: - I'm sorry. - It's okay. Hurry back.
translation.es: - Lo siento. - Está bien. No te demores.

translation.en: - Hey, Patrick. - Charlotte, boy, am I glad to see you.
translation.es: - Hola, Patrick. - Charlotte, qué gusto verte.

translation.en: - I got a question for you. - Sure. What's up?
There's been a hiccup in the Christmas festival planning.
translation.es: Hubo un traspié en la organización.

translation.en: Is there a chance that Charlie's Kitchen could come on as our official restaurant?
translation.es: ¿Podría ser este el restaurante oficial del festival navideño?

translation.en: Really? What happened?
I thought Home Cooking was doing it this year and every year.
translation.es: Creí que Home Cooking se encargaría, como cada año.

translation.en: Yeah, well, Brenda hurt her back, and she's out for at least two weeks.
translation.es: Brenda se lesionó la espalda y necesita reposo por dos semanas.

translation.en: - Oh. - I need someone and thought of you first.
translation.es: Necesito ayuda y primero pensé en ti.

translation.en: Well, thank you for that, but--
Not all of the events need food. Just three of them.
translation.es: No todos los eventos son con comida. Solo tres.

translation.en: Just the opening holiday party, the Christmas Art Festival Showcase,
translation.es: La fiesta de apertura, el festival de arte

translation.en: and the Yuletide Gala.
Um… Well, you know, I love the festival, but the opening's tomorrow.
translation.es: Sabes que me encanta el festival, pero la apertura es mañana.

translation.en: I would be grateful for whatever you put together, it doesn't have to be fancy.
translation.es: Lo que puedas hacer estará bien. No tiene que ser sofisticado.

translation.en: I just… I don't have anyone else I trust to handle this on such late notice.
translation.es: No tengo a nadie más de confianza para hacerlo tan a último momento.

translation.en: Yes?
I mean, I'm sure my mom would love the publicity for the restaurant.
translation.es: A mí mamá le encantará usarlo como publicidad.

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
You have no idea how much this means. You are saving the day.
translation.es: No sabes cuánto te lo agradezco. Me salvaste.

translation.en: Is your mom in the back? Yeah, she is. Tell her I said yes?
translation.es: - ¿Tu mamá está atrás? - Sí. ¿Le dices que acepté?

translation.en: Thanks, Charlotte.
No.
Hey, what are you doing?
I'm fixing the picture. Can't have a messed- up Santa at Christmas.
translation.es: Arreglo el dibujo. Santa no puede verse mal en Navidad.

translation.en: Oh, really?
Yeah, whoever drew this is pretty good too.
translation.es: Sí. Quien lo haya hecho es bastante bueno.

translation.en: - Pretty good? - Absolutely.
Is there something that you'd do differently?
Maybe I would put a Christmas tree right here in the background.
translation.es: Le hubiera dibujado un árbol de Navidad aquí atrás.

translation.en: Hmm. I'd prefer a sleigh. Yes, but the public would be expecting a sleigh.
translation.es: - Yo, un trineo. - Sí, pero la gente esperaría un trineo.

translation.en: Plus, I get to decorate a tree.
translation.es: Y así puedo adornar un árbol.

translation.en: You?
My board, my decorations.
I might let you draw a tree 'cause I can always erase it.
translation.es: Podría dejarte dibujar un árbol, porque igual puedo borrarlo.

translation.en: And you are? The pretty good artist.
translation.es: - ¿Y tú eres? - La artista bastante buena.

translation.en: Oh, well, in that case, I'll just take the tree.
translation.es: Bueno, en ese caso, solo haré el árbol.

translation.en: Okay, Rembrandt, but if you mess it up, you got to answer to the owner.
translation.es: Bueno, Rembrandt, pero si lo haces mal, te las verás con la dueña.

translation.en: Which I'm guessing is probably you.
Yep.
Well, I'm willing to chance it.
Hey, artist at work.
My board.
Okay. Your turn.
Artist at work.
Okay. You're better than pretty good.
- So are you. - Well, thank you.
- And you are? - I'm Wyatt.
- Charlotte. - Your restaurant? Any good?
It is! I'm also the head chef. You're invited to try it.
translation.es: Sí. También soy la chef. Puedes pasar a probar.

translation.en: Sounds good to me. I'd love to try.
Right now, I'm just headed to the craft store, but…
translation.es: Ahora estoy yendo a la tienda de arte, pero…

translation.en: this was fun.
- I'll be seeing you, Charlotte. - Hope so.
- Merry Christmas. - Merry Christmas.
Right, shoes.
One quick touch- up.
- Hey, Ella. - Hey.
Are you coming back anytime soon?
Uh, yeah. I'll be right there. I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
It's really good to see you again. Happy holidays.
translation.es: Me alegra volver a verlos. Felices fiestas.

translation.en: - You made the shoes? - Sorry, I got distracted.
Distracted with painting?
Your mom wants to talk to us about some big news.
translation.es: Tu mamá quiere darnos una noticia.

translation.en: - I already know all about it. - Am I being promoted?
translation.es: - Ya lo sé todo. - ¿Me darán un ascenso?

translation.en: - Am I finally your boss now? - You already got a promotion.
translation.es: - ¿Podré ser tu jefa? - Ya te ascendimos.

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm impatient.
Don't wish for too much because Mom's news is going to tax your cooking skills.
translation.es: No te ilusiones porque la noticia desafiará tu cocina.

translation.en: Huh, yeah. Good, that's news I want to hear.
translation.es: Sí, genial. Justo la noticia que quería oír.

translation.en: The art festival has last- minute food needs, and we have been asked to save the day.
translation.es: El festival de arte necesita comida y nos pidieron ayuda.

translation.en: - I thought-- - Brenda hurt her back.
The Yuletide Gala will be here?
Yep, on the 22nd. Plus, two more events.
translation.es: Sí, el 22. Y dos eventos más.

translation.en: The Gala means out- of- town reporters, articles, blogs.
translation.es: Eso significa que habrá periodistas, artículos, blogs.

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - People all over the country see them.
translation.es: Los verá gente de todo el país.

translation.en: - This could put us on a bigger map. - I know it could be nice.
translation.es: - Nos dará a conocer. - Sería genial.

translation.en: We have to hit the ground running. The opening party is tomorrow.
translation.es: Debemos arrancar con todo. La fiesta de apertura es mañana.

translation.en: So we'll meet here in the morning. Early.
translation.es: Nos vemos aquí en la mañana. Temprano.

translation.en: And for now, let's get on that dinner rush. Come on.
translation.es: Por ahora, ocúpense de la cena. Vamos.

translation.en: I couldn't sleep. I saw the light on. Why are you still up?
translation.es: No podía dormir. Vi la luz encendida. ¿Qué haces despierta?

translation.en: I'm just unwinding, fooling around.
translation.es: Solo trato de relajarme un poco.

translation.en: Don't stay up all night.
translation.es: No te quedes toda la noche.

translation.en: I am worried about tomorrow. I need you to be fresh.
translation.es: Me preocupa lo de mañana. Te necesito descansada.

translation.en: I'll be fine.
I'm sorry, I don't mean to push,
but could this… project wait until tomorrow?
translation.es: pero ¿este… proyecto no puede esperar hasta mañana o después…

translation.en: - Sure-- - Or after the festival?
- Oh, absolutely. - That would be better.
Okay.
Thank you. I'm counting on you.
Of course. You can always count on me.
Good night.
- What you got there? - Free Christmas decorations.
Who's going to argue with free?
You know, people around here always go all out for the holidays.
translation.es: Aquí la gente hace hasta lo imposible en las fiestas.

translation.en: Yeah, I noticed.
And what's… what's this?
Oh, it's just something by the box, I think someone was just throwing it out.
translation.es: Estaba junto a la caja. Alguien lo habrá tirado.

translation.en: No, this is half- finished.
Just toss it then.
- I don't think so. - You want to keep it?
Yeah.
Okay.
Are you really okay with all this extra work? Why wouldn't I be?
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien con tanto trabajo? - ¿Por qué lo dices?

translation.en: I figured both work and getting your painting done for the contest would be too much.
translation.es: Entre el trabajo y el cuadro para el festival, creo que es mucho.

translation.en: - How are you going to do both now? - Don't worry about me.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo harás ambas cosas? - No te preocupes.

translation.en: The restaurant has my complete attention.
translation.es: Tengo toda la atención puesta aquí.

translation.en: You submitted it already?
Nope, I threw it away.
- You what? - Mm- hmm.
You need me. My mom needs me. Everyone needs me.
translation.es: Tú me necesitas, mi mamá me necesita. Todos me necesitan.

translation.en: - It's for the best. - No, it's not. Come on.
translation.es: - Es mejor así. - No, no lo es.

translation.en: Look, as much as I love painting,
last night, I saw how overwhelmed my mom was with all of this.
translation.es: anoche vi lo abrumada que está mi mamá con todo esto.

translation.en: If she can't sleep, then it's serious. So work over hobbies, right?
translation.es: Si no puede dormir, es grave. No es momento de pasatiempos.

translation.en: I don't want you to do something you're going to regret.
translation.es: No quiero que te arrepientas después.

translation.en: No, it's… it's for the best.
Well, look who it is.
Oh, hi. This is a nice surprise.
- Are you offering caricatures? - No.
- Mm- hmm. - Don't mind if I do.
translation.es: - ¿Viniste a dibujar caricaturas? - No. Claro que sí.

translation.en: Thank you.
Oh, that's good.
You know what else is really good? That painting.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué más está muy bueno? Ese cuadro.

translation.en: You okay? You look like you've seen the ghost of Christmas past.
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? Parece que viste un fantasma.

translation.en: - Worse. - What happened?
Nothing. I'm okay. I just-- I hallucinated.
I mean, like, I hope I hallucinated.
Oh, I get it.
Seeing everyone else's artwork out there isn't easy.
translation.es: Ver los cuadros de todos los demás no es fácil.

translation.en: Next year is going to be your year, okay?
We should get back to serving food.
- Would you like some more wine? - Oh, no, thanks.
Are you okay? Did I do something to upset you?
You just disappeared.
You're Wyatt… Graham, the architectural artist?
- You've heard of me? - I have a coffee table book of your work.
translation.es: - ¿Me oíste nombrar? - Tengo un libro de tus obras.

translation.en: You must like hotel lobbies. I like art.
translation.es: - Te gustan los vestíbulos. - Me gusta el arte.

translation.en: So do I.
You know, I find it really strange
that the only art with your name on it isn't even yours.
translation.es: que el único cuadro con tu nombre ni siquiera sea tuyo.

translation.en: I'm not trying to steal anyone's thunder. I'm going to submit my own work.
translation.es: No quiero robarle el crédito a nadie. Presentaré mi obra.

translation.en: I just… I love what there is of this. You don't happen to know who the artist is, do you?
translation.es: Solo me encanta lo que está pintado. ¿De casualidad no conoces al artista?

translation.en: Yeah, I do. And you should take it down.
translation.es: De hecho, sí. Y deberías quitarlo.

translation.en: If the artist wants to tell me in person, I'd be happy to.
translation.es: Si el artista me lo pide, lo haré con gusto.

translation.en: Let's just say the artist threw it away for a reason.
translation.es: Digamos que el artista lo tiró por una razón.

translation.en: I can't imagine what would make an artist throw out a work like this.
translation.es: No entiendo cómo pudo tirar una obra como esta.

translation.en: I can.
Even half finished, there's nothing like it in here.
translation.es: No está completo, pero no hay nada igual aquí.

translation.en: Everyone's talking about it.
Well, it would be better if they were talking about the food.
translation.es: Sería mejor si hablaran de la comida.

translation.en: Excuse me.
Charlotte, we are making a great impression up there.
- Everyone seems to love the food. - All thanks to your and Ella's work.
translation.es: - A todos les encanta la comida. - Todo gracias a ti y a Ella.

translation.en: Well, it's the job, Mom. It's… my only focus right now.
translation.es: Es mi trabajo, mamá. En lo único que me enfoco.

translation.en: That's why you're the best.
Good night. Thanks so much for coming.
Well, I think we pulled it off.
And I'd say the food was pretty perfect.
translation.es: Y debo decir que la comida estuvo perfecta.

translation.en: - Oh, thank you. - I got to say, you look amazing.
Oh, stop it.
Well, it has been a while since I've been this dressed up.
translation.es: Hacía mucho que no me vestía tan elegante.

translation.en: Oh, well, then I need to host a few more of these.
I was wondering, are you coming to the Color Me Christmas event tomorrow?
translation.es: ¿Irás al evento de pintura navideña mañana?

translation.en: I wasn't planning on it.
Charlotte's the artist, I'm the numbers gal.
translation.es: Charlotte hace arte. Yo hago números.

translation.en: Oh, that's too bad.
Thought you might use it as another opportunity to promote your restaurant.
translation.es: Podrías usarlo como otra chance para promover tu restaurante.

translation.en: Lots of out- of- towners never heard of Charlie's Kitchen.
translation.es: Mucha gente de afuera no lo conoce.

translation.en: You've got a point.
- Just think about it. - I'm thinking.
Well, I hope I see you tomorrow, Molly. Good night.
translation.es: Espero verte mañana, Molly. Buenas noches.

translation.en: What was that about?
He wants me to go to Color Me Christmas. Really? You should definitely go.
translation.es: - Quiere que vaya al evento de pintura. - ¿En serio? Deberías ir.

translation.en: Well, I would be promoting the restaurant if I brought some of our hot spice cider.
translation.es: Podría promover el restaurante con nuestra sidra caliente con especias.

translation.en: That works. Business and some pleasure.
translation.es: Buena idea. Negocios y un poco de placer.

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - Just business.
If you say so.
Okay, Wyatt.
What do we draw?
- Hi. - Sorry, we don't open for another… hour.
translation.es: - Hola. - Lo siento. Abrimos dentro de una… hora.

translation.en: I was just taking a walk and I thought, olive branch.
translation.es: Salí a caminar y quise darte una ofrenda de paz.

translation.en: Last night I gave you the wrong impression about why I hung the painting up.
translation.es: Creo que necesito explicarte por qué colgué el cuadro.

translation.en: I'm listening.
I wasn't trying to take credit away from the artist.
translation.es: No quise robarle el crédito a nadie,

translation.en: I was just trying to spotlight the art that spoke to me.
translation.es: solo quise exponer el arte que me conmovió.

translation.en: Well, I love that it spoke to you,
but what if the artist isn't interested in having the art seen?
translation.es: pero ¿y si el artista no quiere que vean su arte?

translation.en: That's a fair question, but why wouldn't they be?
translation.es: Buena pregunta, pero ¿por qué no querría?

translation.en: It's complicated.
I hear the next event is some public painting thing today.
translation.es: Oí que habrá un evento de pintura hoy.

translation.en: You want to come with me?
I'm not much of a painter and maybe you can give me some pointers.
translation.es: No soy buen pintor. Podrías darme unos consejos.

translation.en: I'll think about it.
Can't ask for more than that.
I'll head over early and save you a seat just in case.
translation.es: Iré antes y te guardaré un lugar por si acaso.

translation.en: The mystery man you were hanging around with last night has followed you here?
translation.es: ¿El hombre misterioso con el que hablabas anoche te siguió hasta aquí?

translation.en: His name is Wyatt.
He's a well- known artist.
He seems like a… interesting guy, but, um…
But what?
But we have unfinished business.
Oh, like your unfinished painting hanging at the gallery?
translation.es: ¿Como tu cuadro sin terminar colgado en la galería?

translation.en: I'd know your style anywhere.
Well, only you, and now Wyatt, know that.
translation.es: Eso solo lo sabes tú. Y ahora Wyatt.

translation.en: I should have known you wouldn't throw it out.
translation.es: Debí saber que no ibas a tirarlo.

translation.en: But I did. I threw it in the trash.
translation.es: Lo hice. Lo tiré a la basura.

translation.en: I don't even know how he got his hands on it.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sé cómo lo consiguió.

translation.en: I'm failing to see the problem. Based on what I heard, you could win.
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el problema? Según lo que escuché, podrías ganar.

translation.en: It's a half- finished painting,
nothing that I'd want anyone seeing in its current form.
translation.es: No quiero que nadie lo vea así como está.

translation.en: With the restaurant responsibilities, I can't finish it if I wanted to.
translation.es: Con todo lo del restaurante, no podría terminarlo aunque quisiera.

translation.en: I just-- I'm going to take it down.
- I am. - You had a chance to last night.
Well, people were talking,
and I, you know, like, I didn't want to…
Take it down.
Well, I do now.
Well, I think you should accept the nice artist man's invitation today,
translation.es: Deberías aceptar la invitación del apuesto artista.

translation.en: even if it is to tell him you want your painting back.
translation.es: Aunque sea para decirle que te lo devuelva.

translation.en: Can I at least know more about him?
There's… there's nothing to say.
Tell me you don't want to know more about him. I already know about him.
translation.es: - Dime que no quieres saber más sobre él. - Ya sé sobre él.

translation.en: Well, I mean, I know what he does for a living.
translation.es: Bueno, sé a qué se dedica.

translation.en: Like, I mean, I know his career.
I don't know him personally, but it's the same…
translation.es: No lo conozco como persona, pero…

translation.en: You must want to know more because you're talking in circles.
translation.es: Seguro quieres saber más porque te vas por las ramas.

translation.en: Okay, I'll go if it'll make you happy,
translation.es: Está bien. Si te hace feliz, iré.

translation.en: but only to tell him that I'm taking the painting down.
translation.es: Pero solo para decirle que quitaré el cuadro.

translation.en: Yeah.
Just for that reason.
- Yep. - Just for that.
Not bad.
I thought I heard you coming in.
What are you doing home and dressed like that?
translation.es: ¿Qué haces en casa y así vestida?

translation.en: Ella has the kitchen covered today so I was going to Color Me Christmas.
translation.es: Ella cubrirá la cocina y pensaba ir al evento de pintura.

translation.en: Oh, you are such a good daughter.
I could use a second set of hands with the spice cider.
translation.es: Me vendría bien tu ayuda con la sidra.

translation.en: Oh, I'm happy to help.
I'll take care of the cider.
You know, if you are looking this good, I should step up my game too.
translation.es: Te ves tan bien que yo también tendré que arreglarme un poco más.

translation.en: I'm sure Patrick would like that.
He never crossed my mind.
translation.es: Ni se me cruzó por la mente.

translation.en: Right, right.
Oh, you just…
Charlie's Kitchen cider?
translation.es: Sidra de La cocina de Charlie.

translation.en: Enjoy.
So my invitation was just too irresistible to pass up.
translation.es: Mi invitación fue tan irresistible que no pudiste rechazarla.

translation.en: You got lucky, I was working.
- It's a nice place to work. - Mm- hmm. I love the boats.
translation.es: Bonito lugar para trabajar. Amo los barcos.

translation.en: Yeah, it's an outdoor boat museum. They're part of the town's history.
translation.es: Es un museo barco. Es parte de la historia de aquí.

translation.en: You know, your station here looks like it's self- sufficient.
translation.es: Tu puesto no parece necesitar que lo atiendan.

translation.en: Why not come join me at an easel?
I should really stay here.
People can figure out how to fill their own cups.
- Okay, wise guy. Let's go. - All right.
I warn you, though, using a brush is way different than using a pencil.
translation.es: Pero te advierto: usar pincel es muy distinto a usar lápiz.

translation.en: - Ready for your lesson? - I am.
Wait, it's turning into, like, a watercolor.
- Yeah, that should work. - All right.
So get some green.
Green, green.
- All right. - No.
You hold it like this.
- Oh. - Yeah.
- Almost like a pencil. - Kind of. - All right. - Just let the brush do the work, okay?
translation.es: - Casi como un lápiz. - Casi. Deja que el pincel haga lo suyo.

translation.en: - Hold on. - How's that?
- Here, just let me… - Sure.
Close your eyes.
Just feel it.
Yeah! Look, you can do it.
Hey, you made it.
I did.
They really like our cider.
Yeah, we've had a lot of folks in and out today.
I saw a lot of people over here so that's good.
translation.es: Vi que muchos pasaron por aquí. Qué bien.

translation.en: Well, thank you for inviting us to do this.
translation.es: Gracias por invitarnos a hacer esto.

translation.en: You should go look at what Charlotte is painting.
translation.es: Deberías ver la pintura de Charlotte.

translation.en: She has a talent.
She likes to paint.
It's a good release for her, I guess.
translation.es: Es un buen desahogo para ella.

translation.en: It's been fun spending this holiday time with you.
translation.es: Me gustó pasar estas fiestas contigo.

translation.en: I'd have to agree.
So, what big city do you live in?
Well, what makes you think I'm from a big city?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que soy de una gran ciudad?

translation.en: - Really? -
All right, New York,
but I travel so much for each gig, I can barely say I live there.
translation.es: pero viajo tanto que apenas si vivo allí.

translation.en: And you came to Bayside, why?
To visit my good friend, David.
translation.es: A ver a mi gran amigo David.

translation.en: He's the one who encouraged me to enter the art contest.
translation.es: Él me animó a presentarme al concurso de arte.

translation.en: You mean enter someone else into the art contest?
translation.es: Querrás decir, presentar a alguien más.

translation.en: I'm going to enter.
I just haven't figured out what I want to draw yet.
translation.es: Es solo que aún no sé qué dibujar.

translation.en: Well, Bayside has some beautiful buildings.
I'm tired of architectural drawing.
Well, I like them.
They're so precise, so…
Dry? Unemotional?
- Do they move you? - Yes.
I love them.
Well, I… I always thought they were cold.
translation.es: A mí siempre me resultaron fríos.

translation.en: I mean, I want to bring warmth and life to my work.
translation.es: Quisiera darle vida y calidez a mis trabajos.

translation.en: Like your work.
Even half painted, your work shows so much more than mine.
translation.es: Aunque esté a la mitad, transmite mucho más que la mía.

translation.en: No, but thank you.
Believe me, I know where you're coming from, though.
translation.es: Créeme que entiendo de lo que hablas.

translation.en: So many people have been dictating what I create for them.
translation.es: Mucha gente dictamina lo que debo dibujar.

translation.en: I just-- I want to create something for myself.
translation.es: Solo quiero crear algo para mí mismo.

translation.en: Well, there's nowhere more inspirational than Bayside at Christmas.
translation.es: No hay lugar más inspirador que Bayside en Navidad.

translation.en: I'll be first in line to see what you submit. - Really? - Mm- hmm.
translation.es: - Seré la primera en ver qué presentas. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: Okay. Well, what about you?
You are clearly a talented artist.
Why are you working as a chef?
Sometimes being there for your family is what's most important.
translation.es: A veces lo más importante es apoyar a tu familia.

translation.en: Well, if only someone would understand the value of chasing your dreams.
translation.es: Ojalá alguien entendiera el valor de perseguir sus sueños.

translation.en: You're dreaming if you think you're gonna finish that by dark.
translation.es: Sueñas si crees que terminarás para hoy.

translation.en: - More painting, less talking. - Okay.
translation.es: - Más pintura y menos charla. - De acuerdo.

translation.en: Charlotte, that is so pretty.
Thank you.
- Okay. Be honest. - Okay.
Uh… It's good.
Ah. You know, tomorrow's festival event is Kringle's Krafts in the art gallery.
translation.es: Mañana será el evento Santa Arte en la galería.

translation.en: You could do a demonstration with pencil. You know, try out some ideas on the people there?
translation.es: Podrías hacer una demostración con lápiz, probar ideas con la gente.

translation.en: I bet you they would love to see you work.
Seriously? I haven't drawn with a pencil in a while.
translation.es: ¿En serio? Hace tiempo que no dibujo con lápiz.

translation.en: You could do it. And Patrick would love it.
translation.es: Hazlo. A Patrick le encantará la idea.

translation.en: Would you come?
I just might, after work.
I'm holding you to that.
You know, I think I'm gonna go burn this now.
translation.es: Creo que ahora iré a quemar esto.

translation.en: - No! - Yeah.
- See you at Kringle's Krafts tomorrow? - Tomorrow. Bye.
Bye.
He looks nice.
Wyatt?
Oh, he has a name?
Yeah, he knows mine too.
translation.es: Sí, y él sabe el mío.

translation.en: That's a good start. I am so glad you're getting back out there.
translation.es: Es un buen comienzo. Me alegra mucho que vuelvas al ruedo.

translation.en: That is very nice. Very nice.
- Hey, man. - Hey.
I thought I'd add a little more Christmas cheer in here
translation.es: Se me ocurrió darle un toque más navideño

translation.en: to help get those creative juices flowing.
translation.es: para ayudar a que te inspires.

translation.en: Love it.
Did you fish another painting out of the trash?
No, this one's all mine.
But you were blindfolded, right?
I had my eyes closed for part of it, but I'm not a painter.
translation.es: En una parte los tuve cerrados, pero no soy pintor.

translation.en: Let's see that. Okay.
Then why did you paint this?
Have you and Cheryl already had dinner? I was thinking about getting takeout from Charlie's Kitchen.
translation.es: ¿Tú y Cheryl ya cenaron? Pensaba ordenar de La cocina de Charlie.

translation.en: - It's good food. - Yeah.
And between you and me,
the chef there turned out to be the creator of that painting you found.
translation.es: la chef es la autora del cuadro que encontraste.

translation.en: Okay, I like where this is going.
- So, chef, huh? - Yeah.
You going there for the food or you're going to see her?
translation.es: ¿Irás por la comida o para verla a ella?

translation.en: Both.
- Hello. - Hi.
Is it too late to place an order before closing?
translation.es: ¿Es muy tarde para hacer una orden?

translation.en: Of course not, but we need to talk.
translation.es: Claro que no, pero debemos hablar.

translation.en: Have a seat.
I'm sorry. Have we met?
No. No, I'm Ella. I'm Charlotte's best friend,
translation.es: No. Soy Ella, la mejor amiga de Charlotte

translation.en: and she's not here right now, which is good for us.
translation.es: y ella no está, lo cual es bueno para nosotros.

translation.en: Look, I don't know how you ended up with Charlotte's painting,
translation.es: No sé cómo acabaste con el cuadro de Charlotte,

translation.en: but you clearly thought it was something special if you submitted it to the festival.
translation.es: pero sin duda te resultó especial y por eso lo presentaste.

translation.en: - It is. She's a rare talent. - Mm- hmm.
And she finally decided to enter the contest this year until you cut her off at the knees.
translation.es: Y por fin decidió participar del concurso hasta que tú la desanimaste.

translation.en: I didn't know that, but she also threw the painting out.
translation.es: No sabía eso, pero además, tiró su pintura a la basura.

translation.en: Well… there is that.
But I was going to talk her back into entering and…
that's going to be harder to do with that half- finished painting hanging there.
translation.es: y no será fácil con ese cuadro a medio terminar ahí expuesto.

translation.en: Hmm. What do you suggest?
Let her take it down if that's what she wants to do.
translation.es: Deja que lo quite, si es lo que ella quiere.

translation.en: You know, I can do with some more friends like you.
translation.es: Me vendría bien tener más amigos como tú.

translation.en: I'm glad you understand.
- I love Charlotte. - I like her too.
translation.es: - Adoro a Charlotte. - Me cae muy bien.

translation.en: Thought so.
Now, will that be dine- in or takeout?
Takeout?
Takeout.
Hey.
So, I was thinking about the Gala.
We really need to shine, you know, bring our A- game.
translation.es: Tenemos que lucirnos, brillar más que nunca,

translation.en: So I thought Christmas: something new, something different.
translation.es: y pensé en algo nuevo, algo distinto para Navidad.

translation.en: Butternut squash risotto. Hm?
Sure you want to do something new instead of what we know our customers love?
translation.es: ¿Prefieres algo nuevo y no lo que ya sabemos que adoran?

translation.en: Hundred percent.
- Honey? - Hmm?
What's going on?
You know, it's just a lot of things.
My responsibilities here, I mean, which is my priority.
translation.es: Mi responsabilidad aquí, que es mi prioridad,

translation.en: I'm also enjoying the company of a man who's about to leave town.
translation.es: y también disfruto la compañía de un hombre que se irá.

translation.en: I have conflicted feelings about that.
And I just want to express myself through my paintings.
translation.es: Solo quiero expresarme a través de mis cuadros.

translation.en: I'm just feeling…
Overwhelmed.
You don't think I can manage? I don't think anyone could handle this.
translation.es: - ¿Crees que no podré con todo? - Creo que nadie podría.

translation.en: It's Christmas season, the restaurant is picking up,
translation.es: Son las fiestas, el restaurante está creciendo,

translation.en: the festival…
And you need to go see that man again before he leaves.
translation.es: Y debes ver a ese hombre de nuevo antes de que se vaya.

translation.en: As far as your painting goes,
well, when this is all over, I'm sure you can fit it in.
translation.es: cuando todo termine, seguro tendrás tiempo.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, maybe I can.
Okay. Now, I want to taste that risotto.
translation.es: Bien, ahora quiero probar ese risotto.

translation.en: Yeah, not this one 'cause it burned while we were talking.
translation.es: No, este no porque se quemó mientras hablábamos.

translation.en: Oh, okay, okay, okay.
Okay, I'm just going to go.
Hi. I'm glad you're here.
I'm so sorry I missed the show. We had a later- than- usual lunch service.
translation.es: Perdón por perderme el show. Tuvimos un servicio de almuerzo tarde.

translation.en: - I like it. - Yep.
- I saved the last bit just for you. - Me?
Mm- hmm. You showed me brush technique.
translation.es: Me enseñaste la técnica con pincel.

translation.en: The least I can do is show you a little pencil technique.
translation.es: Lo menos que puedo hacer es enseñarte la técnica con lápiz.

translation.en: Okay, what am I doing exactly?
Well, Santa wouldn't be complete without his belt.
translation.es: Santa no está completo sin su cinturón.

translation.en: All you have to do is darken the lines.
It's great. Just close your eyes and feel it.
translation.es: Es genial. Solo cierra los ojos y siéntelo.

translation.en: Nice.
I have to admit, using a pencil is different than a paintbrush.
translation.es: Debo admitir que usar lápiz es distinto a usar pincel.

translation.en: Feels great to draw again.
Um… Can I-- Can I ask you a favor?
Sure.
I've been putting together samples for my submission piece
translation.es: Hice unos bocetos de la obra que presentaré

translation.en: and was hoping you could look at them.
I could really use an honest opinion.
I'd love to.
- Really? - Mm- hmm.
Th- That's great.
- Well, let's go do that. - Okay.
Whoa!
This is my workspace while I'm here.
Oh, hey. I thought I saw you come in.
- You must be David? - Yes.
- I'm Charlotte. - Nice to meet you…
You're the chef from Charlie's Kitchen.
translation.es: Eres la chef de La cocina de Charlie.

translation.en: I am.
I love your grilled shrimp. It is the best.
translation.es: Tus camarones asados son los mejores.

translation.en: - Well, thanks. - Yeah, and thank you, by the way.
translation.es: - Gracias. - De hecho, gracias a ti.

translation.en: I hear that you're the reason that this guy has gotten into drawing again.
translation.es: Supe que eres la razón por la que este muchacho volvió a dibujar.

translation.en: I just suggested it. He did the rest.
translation.es: Solo se lo sugerí. Él hizo el resto.

translation.en: Well, I got to head to the store, so it was very nice meeting you.
translation.es: Bueno, debo ir a la tienda. Fue un placer conocerte.

translation.en: See you later, buddy.
He's probably my oldest friend.
Keeps me grounded. Just moved here, actually.
translation.es: Me mantiene centrado. Se acaba de mudar aquí.

translation.en: Well, he'll be here awhile then. People who move here don't leave.
translation.es: Entonces aquí estará. Los que se mudan aquí no se van.

translation.en: Good to know.
I just started drawing things that sparked my interest.
translation.es: Empecé a dibujar cosas que captaron mi interés.

translation.en: What do they have in common?
Honestly, I don't know.
Well, you said you travel a lot for work,
so maybe your submission could be about places you visited?
translation.es: Tal vez podrías dibujar sobre los lugares que visitaste.

translation.en: I don't really get to explore much while I'm working.
As soon as I'm finished, it's on to the next.
translation.es: En cuanto termino, debo viajar a otro lugar.

translation.en: My mom's favorite chair.
translation.es: El sillón favorito de mi mamá.

translation.en: She sat in that every Christmas while we opened up presents.
translation.es: Se sentaba ahí en Navidad al abrir los regalos.

translation.en: I like it.
This record player is cool.
My mom, she was a singer with a great career.
translation.es: Mi mamá fue una cantante con una gran carrera.

translation.en: She traveled all over the country from gig to gig, even performed at Carnegie Hall.
translation.es: Viajaba por todo el país de show en show. Hasta actuó en el Carnegie Hall.

translation.en: And that's where she met my father. He was in the orchestra there.
translation.es: Ahí conoció a mi padre. Tocaba en la orquesta.

translation.en: So did you gain any of their musical abilities?
Hm. I can clap my hands to most songs?
translation.es: Puedo aplaudir al ritmo de la mayoría de las canciones.

translation.en: You ever travel with them?
Uh… No.
Once I came around, they taught at a local college and that was it.
translation.es: Cuando yo nací, se dedicaron a enseñar en una escuela local

translation.en: Stopped touring.
- Do you think they regretted it? - Yeah.
I mean, I don't know. I would have.
translation.es: Bueno, no sé. Yo me arrepentiría.

translation.en: I love my career.
I thought you said that you weren't satisfied?
Yeah, maybe that was the wrong choice of word.
It's more like I'm unfulfilled.
You know, I'd rather be drawing by hand.
Instead, I use a computer to create the architecture of choice
translation.es: En cambio, uso una computadora para crear la arquitectura deseada

translation.en: for corporate headquarters or hotels.
And they pay me.
It beats having a real job.
Like being a chef.
You know, I didn't mean it that way.
Um… Cooking is an art form, isn't it?
translation.es: Cocinar es una forma de arte, ¿no?

translation.en: Sure. It can be.
For me, it's a job.
Which is why you should be painting instead of cooking.
translation.es: Por eso deberías estar pintando en vez de cocinando.

translation.en: Easy for you to say, world- traveling artist.
translation.es: Para ti es fácil decirlo, artista viajero.

translation.en: I don't think I could do what you do.
translation.es: No sé si podría hacer lo tuyo.

translation.en: Nothing brings me peace like being at home, especially at Christmas.
translation.es: Nada me da más paz que estar en casa, sobre todo en Navidad.

translation.en: Yeah. I agree with that.
- Which is why I'm here. - Mm- hmm.
Spend Christmas with David and with new people.
translation.es: Para pasar la Navidad con David y con gente nueva.

translation.en: You know, um, I… I don't think these are all that random after all.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? No creo que estos dibujos sean al azar.

translation.en: I bet you have a story about how each of these was a part of your home growing up.
translation.es: Seguro cada uno tiene su historia como parte de tu hogar de niño.

translation.en: Like the rocking chair?
Has anyone ever told you you're very good at changing the subject?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que eres muy buena para cambiar de tema?

translation.en: I have a Girl Scout patch in it.
But look!
Yeah, you might be right.
Maybe I can do something with this.
About the painting in the gallery.
translation.es: Sobre mi cuadro en la galería…

translation.en: Yeah, it's… it's okay. You don't have to explain.
translation.es: Sí, está bien. No tienes que explicarme.

translation.en: Look, you're a talented artist and it wasn't my place to submit your work.
translation.es: Eres una gran artista y no tenía por qué presentar tu obra.

translation.en: It's your painting and if you want to take it down,
translation.es: Es tu cuadro y, si quieres que lo quiten,

translation.en: you don't need my permission.
I know.
So?
I'm taking it down.
Hey, Charlotte.
Is everything okay?
Uh… I need to talk to you.
Yeah, of course.
So, the anonymous painting?
It's mine and I decided to take it down.
Wyatt knows about it.
It's yours?
Charlotte, I love it.
That painting stands a good chance of winning the competition. Are you sure you want to do this?
translation.es: Tiene muchas chances de ganar el concurso. ¿Estás segura de querer quitarlo?

translation.en: Yes, I'm sure.
All right.
All right, well, if you change your mind,
you'll just have to resubmit it with a new application.
translation.es: tendrás que volver a presentarlo con otra solicitud.

translation.en: But using my own name, right?
Good point.
Submissions close on the day of the awards ceremony, the 23rd.
translation.es: La entrega cierra el día de la premiación, el 23.

translation.en: Charlotte.
I hope you submit something.
You have real talent.
Nope.
- Hello! - Hey.
Hey.
So, uh… how's it coming?
- I'm still working on it. - Mm.
Uh… You left this inside on the table.
translation.es: Dejaste esto adentro, sobre la mesa.

translation.en: You missed a call… from London.
translation.es: Tienes una llamada perdida, de Londres.

translation.en: Thanks.
So you and Charlotte?
Yeah, I asked her to give me input on my festival submission.
translation.es: Le pedí su opinión sobre mi obra para el concurso.

translation.en: Sure.
No, really. Charlotte has an inspired approach to art.
translation.es: No, en serio. Tiene una visión sensible del arte.

translation.en: Please tell me there's something else to this other than an inspired approach to art.
translation.es: Por favor, dime que hay algo más que una visión sensible del arte.

translation.en: - Of course there is. - Okay.
She's fun, and she's different, and she's smart.
translation.es: Es divertida, es diferente y es inteligente.

translation.en: She might even understand my dreams better than I do.
translation.es: Creo que capta mis sueños mejor que yo.

translation.en: I just don't know how I can make that work.
translation.es: Es solo que no sé qué hacer.

translation.en: Try this: take her on a real date.
translation.es: Intenta invitarla a una cita de verdad.

translation.en: Spend Christmas with her. Don't prejudge.
translation.es: Pasa la Navidad con ella. No prejuzgues.

translation.en: Just realize you have a lot of time to think about this.
My constant travel doesn't really leave room for meaningful relationships.
translation.es: Mis viajes no dejan espacio para relaciones significativas.

translation.en: You know it killed my last one.
I do.
But people approach things differently and will change for the right person.
translation.es: Pero la gente acomoda su vida y cambia por la persona indicada.

translation.en: My job isn't going to change.
translation.es: Mi trabajo no va a cambiar.

translation.en: Just be open to it, okay?
translation.es: No te cierres a la idea, ¿sí?

translation.en: The call?
Oh, yeah.
London.
Yes, I understand, but I'm not in a position to give you an answer right now.
translation.es: Sí, entiendo, pero no puedo darte una respuesta ahora mismo.

translation.en: Let me get back to you.
Thank you for the offer.
- Whoa. - What's the scoop?
The Hotel Magnifique could use my services.
translation.es: El hotel Magnifique necesita mis servicios.

translation.en: They want to commission drawings for all of their hotels.
translation.es: Quieren mis dibujos para todos sus hoteles.

translation.en: All of them.
That's at least a six- month to a year job in London.
translation.es: Son entre seis meses a un año en Londres.

translation.en: - Big money? - Yeah.
Wow.
What are you going to do?
They want to fly me down right after Christmas.
translation.es: Quieren que viaje después de Navidad.

translation.en: What?
One thing's for sure…
their timing stinks.
Charlotte.
What-- What are you doing here?
Were you up all night?
You took it down.
Yeah, I saw something in it. I didn't intend to finish it.
translation.es: Sí, vi algo en él. No pensaba terminarlo.

translation.en: I just wanted to do that one thing. I just-- I couldn't stop.
translation.es: Solo quería agregarle algo y luego no pude parar.

translation.en: It's not done yet.
Your mom sent me to wake you up.
translation.es: Tu mamá me dijo que te despertara.

translation.en: - She did? - She wanted to let you sleep.
Well, I did all the prep work.
- I must've slept past my alarm. - It's okay.
- I'm so, so, so sorry. - Oh, no, it's okay!
translation.es: - Lo siento mucho. - No, está bien.

translation.en: Oh, so glad you're back. We're starting to get busy.
translation.es: Qué bueno que volvieron. Empezó a llegar gente.

translation.en: We're on it. I will take the crab cakes. Okay, I will take that.
translation.es: - En marcha. Croquetas de cangrejo. - Sí, hazlas.

translation.en: Honey, that's sugar. Are you trying something new?
translation.es: Eso es azúcar. ¿Estás probando algo nuevo?

translation.en: Oh, no. I just grabbed the wrong…
It doesn't matter.
Uh, Charlotte, why don't we take five?
Ella, kitchen's yours.
Okay?
- I'm sorry I was late. - Figured I'd let you sleep.
translation.es: - Perdón por la demora. - Te dejé dormir.

translation.en: I was in the studio painting. I just felt so inspired.
translation.es: Estuve en el estudio pintando. Me sentía muy inspirada.

translation.en: I really needed it.
Is this about Wyatt?
Maybe.
Yes, um, but it's also about me.
translation.es: Sí, pero también es por mí.

translation.en: I'm just not ready to talk about it yet.
translation.es: No estoy lista para hablar de eso.

translation.en: Okay, well…
you know I'm here if you need me.
Thanks, Mom. I'm ready to get back to cooking.
translation.es: Gracias, mamá. Voy a seguir cocinando.

translation.en: Okay.
Is everything all right?
I wish I knew.
Tried giving her support, space, room to breathe.
And look at her. She's more lost than ever.
translation.es: Y mírala. Está más perdida que nunca.

translation.en: Believe me, she's far from lost.
I think she's finding her way.
translation.es: Creo que está encontrando su camino.

translation.en: Really?
I sure hope so.
Trust me. All Charlotte wants to do is make you proud.
translation.es: Te aseguro que Charlotte solo quiere que estés orgullosa de ella.

translation.en: Welcome.
Welcome to the annual Christmas Art Festival Showcase.
translation.es: Bienvenidos a la muestra anual del festival de arte navideño.

translation.en: Now, this year, our chosen artists are going to be decorating trees.
translation.es: Este año, nuestros artistas escogidos estarán decorando árboles.

translation.en: So, watch as they create Christmas magic before your very eyes.
translation.es: Véanlos crear la magia navideña en vivo y en directo.

translation.en: Let the festivities begin!
You really outdid yourself this year, Patrick.
translation.es: De verdad te superaste a ti mismo este año.

translation.en: The gallery looks fabulous. And I love the tree decorating.
translation.es: La galería quedó fabulosa. Y me encanta la decoración de los árboles.

translation.en: Well, thank you.
And people are really talking about the food too.
translation.es: Y la gente no para de hablar de la comida.

translation.en: And business is up, thanks to you and my daughter.
translation.es: El negocio está creciendo gracias a ti y a mi hija.

translation.en: Speaking of Charlotte, I have an idea I'd like to run by you.
translation.es: Hablando de Charlotte, quisiera plantearte una idea que tengo.

translation.en: Looking to decorate that tree too?
- Can you do it by computer? - Stop that.
Yeah, I'm looking at all the art on the walls and some of this work is seriously impressive,
translation.es: Estaba viendo todos los cuadros exhibidos y algunos son realmente impresionantes,

translation.en: but nothing from my favorite artist yet.
translation.es: pero aún no hay nada de mi artista favorita.

translation.en: Doesn't mean I'm not working on it.
Because of you, I am finishing my painting.
translation.es: Por ti, voy a terminar mi cuadro.

translation.en: - That's great. - Mm- hmm.
I, on the other hand, am still unsure of what I want to draw.
translation.es: En cambio yo sigo sin saber qué dibujar.

translation.en: Okay, I'm finding that very hard to believe.
Can't a guy fish for more help from his favorite artist?
I'd be grateful for any ideas.
In that case, I know just the place to help you get fresh ideas
translation.es: En ese caso, tengo el lugar perfecto para ayudarte a tener ideas nuevas

translation.en: and shake you out of that funk.
Meet me after I'm done here?
- Can't say no to that. - Perfect.
You should check out the ornaments.
- Are they all personal? - They are.
Every person writes down something they're grateful for every year.
translation.es: Cada año, todos aquí escriben por qué están agradecidos.

translation.en: Reminds us that we're not going through life alone, you know?
translation.es: Nos recuerda que no pasamos por esta vida solos, ¿sabes?

translation.en: And it's also tradition for couples to put up a joint ornament each year.
translation.es: Y también las parejas colocan un adorno juntos como tradición.

translation.en: And have you ever put up an ornament with anybody?
I have. His name was Jeff.
I won't be putting up another ornament with him.
translation.es: No volveré a poner otro adorno con él.

translation.en: What happened?
We both grew up together here, and he couldn't wait to get out,
translation.es: Los dos crecimos aquí, pero él estaba ansioso por irse.

translation.en: and I needed to be here.
He finally left a few Christmases ago.
translation.es: Finalmente se fue hace unas navidades.

translation.en: You've never wanted to leave?
My mom needs me right now.
Well, I'd love to see what ornament you put up this year.
translation.es: Me encantaría ver qué adorno pusiste este año.

translation.en: You think you can find it?
- I think so. - All right.
Let's take a look.
Warmer.
Cold. Cold.
Freezing, freezing, freezing.
- Flavor? - Yeah, flavor. Seasoning.
I'm grateful for everything in my life.
For the flavor everyone brings to it.
translation.es: El sabor que cada persona le aporta.

translation.en: Well, if it means anything, you've already added flavor to my life.
translation.es: No sé si te importe, pero le agregaste sabor a mi vida.

translation.en: Goes both ways.
So, do they let visitors participate?
- Any unclaimed ornament can be yours. - Okay.
translation.es: - Cualquier adorno vacío puede ser tuyo. - Bien.

translation.en: You okay?
Yeah. I'm great.
Okay.
Christmas in Bayside?
It brought me here to see my friend David
translation.es: Me trajo a ver a mi amigo David

translation.en: and gave me something personal, and I'm grateful.
translation.es: y me dio algo personal por lo que estoy agradecido.

translation.en: So my plan coming here worked?
translation.es: ¿Así que mi plan de venir aquí funcionó?

translation.en: Better than you could ever know.
translation.es: Más de lo que puedas imaginar.

translation.en: You want to share?
Hmm… Not yet.
And I'm grateful that Christmas in Bayside introduced me to you.
translation.es: Doy gracias a la Navidad en Bayside por haberte conocido.

translation.en: You know, there's this awesome hot chocolate stand.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Hay un puesto de chocolate caliente increíble.

translation.en: Lead the way.
Wyatt, you in there?
- I did it. - Hey, someone had their morning coffee.
translation.es: - Lo hice. - Hola, veo que ya tomaste tu café.

translation.en: I finished my painting.
It's amazing. I couldn't wait for you to see it.
translation.es: - Es increíble. - Estaba ansiosa por mostrártelo.

translation.en: Can I see yours?
Um… Not… not yet.
I'm going to be late to the restaurant, but I couldn't wait for you to see it.
translation.es: Voy tarde al restaurante, pero quería mostrártelo.

translation.en: - I love it. - I'll see you later?
- Yeah, sure. - Okay.
Yay!
Oh, good that you're here.
We were just discussing how to freshen up events,
translation.es: Estábamos viendo de organizar nuevos eventos

translation.en: and I thought with such fabulous chefs on my team,
translation.es: y pensé que con chefs tan fabulosas en mi equipo,

translation.en: why not make tomorrow's open day a Christmas Cookie Decorating event?
translation.es: mañana podríamos hacer el día de decorar galletas navideñas.

translation.en: Show families that art can be tasty too.
translation.es: Mostrar que el arte también puede ser delicioso.

translation.en: I like it, but I wanted to talk to you first.
translation.es: Me gusta, pero primero quería hablarlo contigo.

translation.en: Well, as long as we have a day to prepare, I'd love to.
translation.es: Mientras tengamos un día para prepararlo, me encantaría.

translation.en: We could host it here between lunch and dinner when we're closed?
translation.es: ¿Podría ser aquí entre el almuerzo y la cena?

translation.en: That'd be okay with you?
Like you don't want to make cookies. I already have ideas.
translation.es: - Como si no quisieras hacer galletas. - Ya tengo ideas.

translation.en: That's great! I'll fire up the publicity machine and fill this place up.
translation.es: Genial. Promocionaré el evento para que se llene.

translation.en: I volunteer to get the ingredients. I know exactly how to do this.
translation.es: Iré por los ingredientes. Sé bien cómo hacerlo.

translation.en: - I'll go with you. - Okay!
Have fun!
Thank you for being so accommodating.
I know. It'll be fun.
I love Christmas cookies and this would be really good for the restaurant.
translation.es: Amo las galletas de Navidad y será genial para el restaurante.

translation.en: You could invite Wyatt.
You read my mind.
Ella did most of the prep on the cookies. She was really, really in her element.
translation.es: Ella preparó casi todo lo de las galletas. Se nota que es lo suyo.

translation.en: - Should be fun. - Then I'll be there.
I wouldn't miss cookie instruction for anything.
translation.es: No me perdería la clase por nada.

translation.en: Did you get any work done today?
I did, and, you know, I'm feeling very inspired.
translation.es: Sí, y me siento muy inspirado.

translation.en: Good.
Well, we have a full day tomorrow and I need my beauty rest, so…
translation.es: Bueno, mañana será un día agitado y necesito dormir para no verme fatal.

translation.en: - No, you don't. - Stop.
I wouldn't think of it.
- Wow. Nice crowd. You ready? - Mm- hmm.
I'm doing it with Ella. I wouldn't dream of doing it without her.
translation.es: Lo haré con Ella. Si no, sería imposible.

translation.en: Plus, she knows more about this than I do. I don't even know where to begin.
translation.es: Además, sabe más de esto que yo. Ni sé por dónde empezar.

translation.en: Maybe you could start by not wearing the ingredients.
Oh, my God. Thank you.
It's time to get started.
You got this.
Thank you all for being here. Such a turnout. Look at all of these beautiful families!
translation.es: Gracias por haber venido. Cuánta gente. Muchas familias hermosas.

translation.en: Today, we are going to be decorating Christmas cookies
translation.es: Hoy vamos a decorar galletas navideñas

translation.en: with Bayside's very own Chef Charlotte Williams!
translation.es: con la chef de Bayside, Charlotte Williams.

translation.en: Hi!
I'll be joined by dessert chef extraordinaire, Chef Ella.
translation.es: Me acompaña la experta en pastelería, la chef Ella.

translation.en: Now, every table has fresh baked cookies courtesy of Ella,
translation.es: En cada mesa hay galletas recién horneadas por Ella

translation.en: as well as different frosting colors and candies to suit your artistic vision.
translation.es: y glaseados de diferentes colores y dulces para decorar a gusto.

translation.en: So, let's all start with our Christmas tree cookie.
translation.es: Comencemos con la galleta de árbol de Navidad.

translation.en: Do you guys all have one?
While there's no wrong way to frost a cookie,
there are a few techniques to create something special.
translation.es: hay técnicas para crear algo especial.

translation.en: So, let's learn how to feather the frosting to create pine needles.
translation.es: Veamos cómo glasear las ramas del pino.

translation.en: What's wrong?
The event is running long and we still have dinner service.
translation.es: Se está demorando y tenemos el servicio de la cena.

translation.en: I told them that I would be the bad guy and clear everyone out.
translation.es: Les dije que puedo encargarme de sacar a todos.

translation.en: I don't want to cost you money.
We have a roomful of potential customers. Let's see if they want to stay for dinner service.
translation.es: Son posibles clientes. Preguntemos si quieren quedarse a cenar.

translation.en: - That's genius. - Half price! Let's do it!
translation.es: - Gran idea. - A mitad de precio. ¡Hagámoslo!

translation.en: All right.
The fine folks here at Charlie's Kitchen
translation.es: La hermosa gente de La cocina de Charlie

translation.en: have asked if you'd all like to stay for half- price dinner.
translation.es: pregunta si quieren quedarse a cenar por la mitad del precio.

translation.en: What do you say? Anyone interested?
I'll get the oven prepped and sauces started for dinner service.
translation.es: Prepararé el horno y empezaré con las salsas.

translation.en: - I'll get the rest. - I got the menus.
translation.es: - Yo haré el resto. - Voy por los menús.

translation.en: And I will, uh, start setting tables.
Your wait staff just saw the crowd. They look pretty happy.
translation.es: Los meseros están felices de ver tanta gente.

translation.en: Great.
I don't think we've been officially introduced. I'm Molly, Charlotte's mom.
translation.es: Creo que no nos presentamos oficialmente. Molly, mamá de Charlotte.

translation.en: I'm Wyatt, and I see where she gets her good looks.
translation.es: Wyatt. Veo de dónde heredó su belleza.

translation.en: - You can keep this one. -
- So, anything I can do to help? - Do you know how to wash dishes?
translation.es: - ¿Te puedo ayudar en algo? - ¿Sabes lavar platos?

translation.en: Our dishwasher just called in sick.
Bring it on.
I love a full house.
That felt great.
Better get used to it.
This place is going to be packed again for the Gala tomorrow night.
translation.es: Mañana volverá a llenarse por la fiesta.

translation.en: I think we can handle it.
I'm excited. Our chance for some real press.
translation.es: Qué emoción. Tendremos cobertura en los medios.

translation.en: So, how about a quick coffee before we call it a night? Hmm?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal un café antes de irnos?

translation.en: - I think we all earned it. - I'll help you?
Great night.
But I still have a lot of work to do when I get back to David's.
translation.es: Pero aún tengo mucho trabajo por hacer hoy.

translation.en: - I thought you were on a roll? - I am. I just want it to be perfect.
translation.es: - ¿No estabas inspirado? - Sí, pero quiero que quede perfecto.

translation.en: Hey, you two.
I forgot to say I'd love an extra shot of espresso with mine.
translation.es: Olvidé decir que quiero expreso extra en el mío.

translation.en: I'll go see if anyone else wants something special in theirs.
translation.es: Veré si alguien quiere algo más en su café.

translation.en: I like him.
Me too.
- Well, I'd like to talk to you about him. - I'm sure you would.
translation.es: - Quisiera hablarte de él. - Ya lo creo.

translation.en: Okay, fine. I get it. New subject.
translation.es: Está bien, entiendo. Cambio de tema.

translation.en: You still pulling all- nighters on your painting?
No, I actually finished it last night, but I'm not submitting it.
translation.es: No. De hecho, lo terminé anoche, pero no lo presentaré.

translation.en: - What? - Yeah.
I found something better to do with it.
translation.es: Encontré algo mejor que hacer con él.

translation.en: I'm going to give it to Wyatt for Christmas.
translation.es: Se lo regalaré a Wyatt en Navidad.

translation.en: Now, let's get these coffees out there, right?
Come on. I got it.
Ella, Charlotte, get some rest.
We have a big day tomorrow.
- Wyatt, I hope we'll see you there? - I wouldn't miss it.
translation.es: - Wyatt, espero que vayas. - No me lo perdería.

translation.en: We're going to take a walk.
Good night.
You went above and beyond for me and my family tonight.
translation.es: Realmente te la jugaste hoy por mi familia.

translation.en: All I did was washing dishes. You and Ella did all the heavy lifting.
translation.es: Yo solo lavé los platos. Tú y Ella hicieron el trabajo duro.

translation.en: So, did you decide what you're gonna draw?
I think you're going to like it.
translation.es: Creo que te va a gustar.

translation.en: That's all you're going to say? You're going to make me pry it out of you?
translation.es: ¿Solo eso vas a decir? ¿Tendré que forzarte a hablar?

translation.en: What is it?
Well, I can tell you it's better than I could have ever hoped.
translation.es: Puedo decirte que es mejor de lo que esperaba.

translation.en: - Okay. - You added what was missing.
translation.es: - Bien. - Tú agregaste lo que faltaba.

translation.en: Really? What?
Flavor. That special inspiration only you could bring.
translation.es: Sabor. Esa inspiración especial que solo tú me das.

translation.en: - Wow… -
And?
And what?
What is it? What are you drawing?
Okay, I get it. You're not talking.
Charlotte, I want you to know I've been happier this past week
translation.es: Quiero que sepas que hacía mucho tiempo que no me sentía

translation.en: than I've been in a very long time.
translation.es: tan feliz como esta última semana.

translation.en: Me too.
Okay, I need the right red. The right red.
translation.es: Necesito el rojo exacto. El rojo indicado.

translation.en: Christmas red.
You talk to yourself a lot when you paint? What are you doing here?
translation.es: - ¿Sueles hablar sola cuando pintas? - ¿Qué haces aquí?

translation.en: Gabe suggested I come talk to you. Why?
translation.es: - Gabe sugirió que hablara contigo. - ¿Por qué?

translation.en: He got tired of me telling him how worried I was about you.
translation.es: Se cansó de que le dijera que estaba preocupada por ti.

translation.en: He has a point.
I've been trying to set you up with guys since Jeff,
translation.es: Desde Jeff, he intentado buscarte pareja

translation.en: and I'm worried you've fallen for someone who's gonna leave.
translation.es: y me preocupa que te enamores de alguien que se va a ir.

translation.en: And, you know, he is leaving.
translation.es: Porque sí sabes que se irá.

translation.en: I mean, it has occurred to me.
- But! - But what?
But I think we actually have something here,
translation.es: Pero creo que de verdad hay algo entre nosotros

translation.en: and I want to believe that he would actually want to stay.
translation.es: y quiero creer que va a querer quedarse.

translation.en: Honey!
He got me painting like I did when I first discovered it.
translation.es: Me hizo querer volver a pintar como antes.

translation.en: He did this!
This is more than my happy place.
It's… it's where I belong.
- I've known that for quite some time. - You could have told me.
translation.es: - Hace tiempo que lo sé. - Pudiste decírmelo.

translation.en: Is there really more than one color red?
So what I'm looking for is Rosso Corsa red? A bright, beautiful, brilliant Christmas red.
translation.es: Estoy buscando el rosso corsa, un rojo navideño brillante y hermoso.

translation.en: It's a funny name.
- Italian sports car red. - Oh, pardon me.
translation.es: - El de los autos deportivos italianos. - Perdón.

translation.en: - I have a tube here somewhere. - I'll help you find it.
translation.es: - Por aquí tengo un tubo. - Te ayudo.

translation.en: Wait.
I don't want to keep you, we have to prep for the Gala in the morning.
translation.es: No quiero demorarte. Mañana hay que preparar todo.

translation.en: We do, but first we need to find your red.
translation.es: Sí, pero antes tenemos que encontrar tu rojo.

translation.en: - What's it called again? -
Nope.
Hey, buddy. I'm heading to bed. Can I get you anything?
translation.es: Oye, amigo. Me voy a la cama. ¿Necesitas algo?

translation.en: Nah, you've done more than enough.
You know, I'm watching your work,
and it just reminds me of the loft in New York.
translation.es: y me recuerda a cuando vivíamos en Nueva York.

translation.en: Crazy Wyatt working until the middle of the night.
translation.es: El loco Wyatt trabajando hasta altas horas de la noche.

translation.en: You know, I feel like Crazy Wyatt.
translation.es: Me siento como el loco Wyatt.

translation.en: Yeah, well, women can do that to you.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, las mujeres suelen hacernos eso.

translation.en: Yeah, she is the nicest person I've ever met.
translation.es: Sí. Es la persona más linda que he conocido.

translation.en: - Mm. - And I've been a lot of places.
I guess it would be safe to say that you found your muse?
translation.es: ¿Podría decirse que encontraste a tu musa?

translation.en: I think more.
Whoa.
Oh, wow.
Not bad, huh?
- Great work, buddy. Great work. -
What are you doing?
Making your butternut squash risotto. I added a few extras of my own.
translation.es: Tu risotto de calabaza. Le puse unos toques propios.

translation.en: I never did finish a good version of this.
I just kept getting distracted and messing it up.
Well, your heart wasn't in it, but I love the idea, plus it turned out amazing.
translation.es: No le pusiste pasión, pero me encanta la idea y quedó increíble.

translation.en: Here, try.
This is incredible. We need to serve this tonight.
translation.es: Está increíble. Lo serviremos esta noche.

translation.en: With an herb chicken breast. We making progress?
translation.es: - Con pollo a las hierbas. - ¿Algún avance?

translation.en: We were discussing what to serve tonight at the Gala.
And?
Ella's butternut squash risotto with herb chicken is Christmas on a plate.
translation.es: El risotto de calabaza de Ella con pollo a las hierbas va justo.

translation.en: - Ella's? - Really?
Really. This is your happy place.
Well, it's your call. You're the head chef.
translation.es: Tú decides, eres la jefa de cocina.

translation.en: I will get back to decorating so you can cook.
translation.es: Seguiré decorando para que puedan cocinar.

translation.en: You have no idea what this means to me.
translation.es: No sabes lo que significa esto para mí.

translation.en: Trust me. I absolutely do.
translation.es: Créeme que lo sé perfectamente bien.

translation.en: Thank you.
You concentrate, you get the perfect delicious chicken.
translation.es: Te concentras y haces un pollo delicioso.

translation.en: - Been cooking chicken since I was ten. - You've been painting since you were nine.
translation.es: - Hago pollo desde los diez. - Y pintas desde los nueve.

translation.en: - You need to tell your mother. - I know.
translation.es: - Debes hablar con tu madre. - Lo sé.

translation.en: - You can't tell them apart. - That's the point.
I learned from the best. You are a terrific cook.
translation.es: Aprendí de la mejor. Eres una excelente cocinera.

translation.en: Sometimes the student surpasses the teacher.
translation.es: A veces, el alumno supera al maestro.

translation.en: Trouble? Email from my friend in London.
translation.es: - ¿Problemas? - Correo de mi amigo en Londres.

translation.en: Double the money of the original offer and first- class tickets to London the day after Christmas.
translation.es: Me ofrecieron el doble de dinero y viajar a Londres en primera el 26.

translation.en: Whoa.
Well, you're going to have to answer them.
Yeah, I know.
I can't believe it, there is not a sour face in the room.
translation.es: No puedo creerlo. Todos se ven contentos.

translation.en: At this rate, we are guaranteed to be in every article and blog.
translation.es: A este paso, estaremos en cada artículo y en cada blog.

translation.en: Do you think they'll want my photo? Do I look okay?
You look beautiful.
And if they don't want your picture, I do.
translation.es: Y si ellos no quieren tu foto, yo sí.

translation.en: We just might have pulled it off.
There's not one plate with a single grain of rice left on it.
translation.es: No quedó un grano de arroz en ningún plato.

translation.en: All thanks to you. You made the right call.
translation.es: Todo gracias a tu sabia decisión.

translation.en: Thanks.
Sorry to interrupt.
I'll go check in with your mom and see if there's anything else.
translation.es: Iré a preguntarle a tu mamá si hace falta algo más.

translation.en: I know I'm probably not supposed to be back here now, but I need to talk to you.
translation.es: Sé que no debería estar aquí ahora, pero necesito hablar contigo.

translation.en: No, I'm glad you are. There are dishes to wash.
translation.es: No, me alegra que vinieras. Hay platos para lavar.

translation.en: Absolutely. Grab me an apron.
I'm kidding. We have help, but I love that you were so ready to go.
translation.es: Es broma. Tenemos a alguien, pero me encanta que agarraste viaje.

translation.en: Unfortunately, that's why I'm here.
I have a job in London after Christmas,
translation.es: Me ofrecieron un trabajo en Londres

translation.en: and I wanted to be completely transparent with you.
translation.es: y quería ser completamente honesto contigo.

translation.en: I also wanted to ask if you would wanna-- No, no, it's fine. It's… it's fine.
translation.es: - También quería preguntarte si quisieras… - No, no. Está bien. Está… Está bien.

translation.en: Like… it's not that I wasn't expecting this.
translation.es: No es que no me lo esperara.

translation.en: I mean, it's just a bit more abrupt and direct than I was expecting.
translation.es: Es solo un poco más abrupto y directo de lo que pensé.

translation.en: But you're you.
You're… you're great.
You're in demand.
Um… I'll be fine. I…
translation.es: Y te necesitan. Estaré bien. Yo…

translation.en: I'm fine.
- Uh… Are you staying for the contest? - Charlotte!
- They want a photo of all three of us. - Not right now.
translation.es: - Quieren una foto de las tres. - Ahora no.

translation.en: You made a huge difference in my life.
translation.es: Marcaste una enorme diferencia en mi vida.

translation.en: Thank you for that.
What did you do?
Charlotte, wait. Look, I wasn't trying to hurt you.
translation.es: Charlotte, espera. No era mi intención lastimarte.

translation.en: You didn't let me tell you the rest of my news.
Look, you have a vagabond life.
I have a find a place you love and stay kind of life.
translation.es: Yo, en cambio, me quedo en el lugar que amo.

translation.en: - Oil and water. - It doesn't have to be.
translation.es: - Agua y aceite. - No tiene que ser así.

translation.en: Yeah, it does.
You know, for a moment there, I had dreams of you staying,
translation.es: Por un momento, soñé que te quedarías,

translation.en: working from here.
I shouldn't have. I knew better.
translation.es: No debí ilusionarme. Sabía que esto pasaría.

translation.en: But you did teach me something that I'm so grateful for.
