translation.es: Pero me enseñaste algo que valoro mucho.

translation.en: What was that?
That my art is something special.
It is.
And I intend to keep pursuing it.
That's what I was trying to tell you. You can come with me.
translation.es: Eso es lo que intentaba decirte. Puedes venir conmigo.

translation.en: To London?
I'm hoping you'll say yes.
This could be your chance to start fresh as an artist without anything holding you back.
translation.es: Es tu chance de volver a empezar como artista sin que nada te detenga.

translation.en: Wyatt, this is my home.
But you're stuck here doing something with your life you don't love.
translation.es: Pero estás atrapada haciendo algo que no amas.

translation.en: No, I'm not.
Being a chef isn't my life. You helped me understand that.
translation.es: Mi vida no es ser chef. Tú me ayudaste a entender eso.

translation.en: I'm an artist.
That's what I am.
But I can't go with you.
And if this London job is your dream that you need to follow,
translation.es: Y si ese empleo en Londres es tu sueño y deseas cumplirlo,

translation.en: I don't get in the way of dreams.
translation.es: no me interpondré en tu sueño.

translation.en: I know how important they are.
- Charlotte, just… - Goodbye, Wyatt.
I wasn't expecting to see you here today, you know, after last night.
translation.es: No esperaba verte hoy aquí, después de lo de anoche.

translation.en: I wanted to talk to you, but your door was closed.
translation.es: Quería hablarte, pero tu puerta estaba cerrada.

translation.en: I appreciate that.
That's my favorite.
But there are quite a few others in that studio of yours that are really quite beautiful.
translation.es: Pero hay otros más en tu estudio que son realmente muy hermosos.

translation.en: Really? You noticed?
Of course I noticed. You're my daughter. I love everything you do.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Eres mi hija. Amo todo lo que haces.

translation.en: I always thought you considered them a hobby.
translation.es: Creí que los veías como un pasatiempo.

translation.en: I did, and I am so sorry.
translation.es: Así era. Y lo siento muchísimo.

translation.en: I have something I want to show you.
You leaving?
I am.
I took the London job. Just called and got an earlier flight.
translation.es: Acepté el empleo en Londres. Llamé y adelanté el vuelo.

translation.en: What? Whoa, hang on. Whoa.
You're leaving before Christmas?
What about Charlotte? What about the contest?
The contest?
I started off doing it for me,
I ended up doing it for her and…
now she's gone.
Gone? Wait, hold--
What happened?
I told her about London.
When… when you got here, you were complaining to me
translation.es: Mira, cuando llegaste aquí, te quejabas

translation.en: about how you felt like your art had become this computer- generated business.
translation.es: de que tu arte se había convertido en un negocio generado por computadora.

translation.en: You weren't happy artistically.
translation.es: No estabas feliz en lo artístico.

translation.en: Okay? But I've watched you since you got here.
translation.es: Y te estuve observando desde que llegaste.

translation.en: When you were making this, you were smiling.
Heck! Even when you weren't working on this, you were smiling.
translation.es: Cuando no estabas pintando esto, también estabas sonriendo.

translation.en: Do you know why that is?
No, I'll tell you why.
It's not because of the art.
It's because of her.
- You know, I asked her to come with me. - Great.
translation.es: - Le pedí que fuera conmigo. - Genial.

translation.en: She said no.
And did she tell you why she said no?
This is her home.
This is where she wants to be.
Sometimes we just need to learn to get out of our own way, Wyatt.
translation.es: A veces, debemos aprender a no ser nuestro propio obstáculo.

translation.en: Just hold on to the things that make you happy.
translation.es: Aférrate a las cosas que te hacen feliz.

translation.en: Okay? Everything else is just going to fall into place.
translation.es: ¿Sí? Todo lo demás se irá acomodando.

translation.en: I tried.
Thank you for everything, man.
- Of course. - It's really good to see you again.
translation.es: - Claro. - Me encantó volver a verte.

translation.en: Come here.
Now…
I better go before…
I don't know.
One more thing.
Make sure she gets this.
See you.
Hey, wait! What am I supposed to…
do with this?
Wait, did you…
Is this the unfinished painting that everyone's talking about?
translation.es: ¿Es el cuadro sin terminar del que todos hablan?

translation.en: This is the one I threw in the trash. And I'm really glad I did.
translation.es: Es el que tiré a la basura. Y me alegra haberlo hecho.

translation.en: It is spectacular.
You really are a special talent.
I can't enter this one.
I won't.
I'm going to give it to Wyatt for Christmas.
translation.es: Se lo daré a Wyatt en Navidad.

translation.en: So I painted a different one.
It's called Christmas at Charlie's.
translation.es: Se llama Navidad en lo de Charlie.

translation.en: Honey, it is magnificent.
Mom.
I can't be both a painter and a head chef.
translation.es: no puedo ser pintora y jefa de cocina.

translation.en: Believe me, I have tried.
I am sorry if the pressures of running the restaurant
translation.es: Lamento si la presión de dirigir el restaurante

translation.en: made you feel like you weren't allowed to follow your dreams.
translation.es: te hizo sentir que no podías seguir tus sueños.

translation.en: I don't regret one second of it.
It's our family's legacy.
The restaurant will be fine, and I will be fine.
translation.es: El restaurante estará bien y yo estaré bien.

translation.en: What I need most is for my daughter to do what she loves.
translation.es: Lo único que necesito es que mi hija haga lo que ama.

translation.en: Now, I hope you're entering this one.
I most certainly am.
And I really want you to be at the awards ceremony.
translation.es: Y quiero que estés en la ceremonia de premiación.

translation.en: I need your support.
Okay, I'm going to go clear my head.
translation.es: Bueno, voy a despejar la mente.

translation.en: I'm going to go to the Christmas tree and add another ornament.
translation.es: Iré a poner otro adorno en el árbol de Navidad.

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry about Wyatt.
It's sad, but I'm a better person now that I knew him.
translation.es: Es triste, pero el conocerlo me hizo mejor persona.

translation.en: And I like that.
Charlotte!
David, hi!
You're putting up an ornament, nice.
No. Um… no, no.
Uh… Wyatt left this at my place.
translation.es: Wyatt lo dejó en mi casa.

translation.en: I brought it to show you.
You know, he is more than grateful for you.
translation.es: Él está más que agradecido de haberte conocido.

translation.en: I mean, the drawing he did for the contest, you need to see it.
translation.es: El cuadro que hizo para el concurso… tienes que verlo.

translation.en: Where is it?
He left it at my place.
You know, I thought I had it all figured out before he got here.
translation.es: Antes de que él llegara, creí que tenía todo resuelto.

translation.en: But I quit my job and I'm dedicating my life to painting.
translation.es: Pero ahora renuncié a mi trabajo para dedicar mi vida a la pintura.

translation.en: He gave that to me.
translation.es: Y eso es gracias a él.

translation.en: That's incredible.
Can I…
Can I show you what you gave to him?
translation.es: ¿Puedo mostrarte lo que le diste a él?

translation.en: Well, what are we waiting on?
- Great. -
Hold on.
He's not going to, like, jump out or anything, is he?
translation.es: No se va a aparecer de sorpresa, ¿no?

translation.en: No. No, he's gone.
Gone, like gone?
I thought he was going to at least stay to enter the contest.
translation.es: Creí que al menos se quedaría para el concurso.

translation.en: No. No, he left.
But…
not entirely.
He wanted you to have it.
I had no idea.
David, I… I can't accept this.
Why not?
Because every time I look at it, I just…
translation.es: Porque cada vez que lo mire,

translation.en: will be reminded that he's gone.
You know, he said you were his muse.
Thank you.
I'm glad I got to see it.
Thanks again. Merry Christmas.
Merry Christmas, Charlotte.
Just the person I'm looking for.
Hi.
I just wanted to make sure everything was back in order after the Gala last night.
translation.es: Quería ver que todo estuviera en orden después de anoche.

translation.en: Ella, what would I do without you?
What would I do without all of this?
You have been a rock since you first got here,
translation.es: Tuvimos tu apoyo incondicional desde que llegaste.

translation.en: and I think it's time you get the credit you deserve.
translation.es: Es hora de darte el reconocimiento que mereces.

translation.en: Charlotte has decided to pursue her painting,
translation.es: Charlotte decidió dedicarse a la pintura

translation.en: and I am in the market for a new head chef.
translation.es: y yo busco una nueva jefa de cocina.

translation.en: You are just what this restaurant needs. The job is yours if you want it.
translation.es: Eres lo que el restaurante necesita. El puesto es tuyo si lo quieres.

translation.en: Yes! Yes, yes!
I just-- That was a position you wanted to keep in the family.
translation.es: Pero creí que ese puesto era solo para la familia.

translation.en: You don't think you're family? Are you kidding?
Now get your coat.
You and I have an awards ceremony to get ready for on Charlotte's request.
translation.es: Debemos ir a la ceremonia de premiación a pedido de Charlotte.

translation.en: What about dinner service prep?
translation.es: ¿Y quién se encargará de la cena?

translation.en: Oh, you have staff for that now. They know what to do.
translation.es: Tienes personal para eso. Ya saben qué hacer.

translation.en: We'll be back before the first diner.
- - Thank you!
I'm glad you changed your mind.
translation.es: Me alegra que cambiaras de idea.

translation.en: It's beautiful.
I called London back.
Turned down the job.
You did?
I sure did.
- I love it. It's amazing. - It's the reason I couldn't leave.
translation.es: - Me encanta. Es precioso. - Es la razón por la que no me fui.

translation.en: The reason I drew it.
I can't stop thinking about you.
translation.es: No paro de pensar en ti.

translation.en: I can't stop thinking about you either.
And this.
This right here.
This is your heart on a canvas.
translation.es: es tu corazón sobre el lienzo.

translation.en: You're meant to do this.
So are you.
- Charlotte and Wyatt? I thought… - Is something wrong?
Apparently not.
I have so many questions, but I know better than to ask right now.
translation.es: Tengo tantas preguntas, pero sé que no es el momento.

translation.en: I'm gonna go look at some art.
You know, I've been doing some thinking,
and I believe that it would greatly benefit all parties involved
translation.es: y creo que sería un gran beneficio para todos si tu restaurante

translation.en: if Charlie's Kitchen were to become the festival's official food supplier from now on.
translation.es: fuera el proveedor oficial de comida del festival de ahora en adelante.

translation.en: We'd have to work very closely on it, of course.
translation.es: Tendríamos que trabajar a la par, claro.

translation.en: Well, I happen to know the owner of the restaurant,
translation.es: Bueno, da la casualidad que conozco a la dueña.

translation.en: and maybe you would like to join her for dinner there sometime.
translation.es: Quizás quieras cenar con ella algún día.

translation.en: I would like that very much.
It was my family's dream to make Charlie's Kitchen the heart of the community,
translation.es: Mi familia soñaba con que el restaurante fuera el corazón de la comunidad,

translation.en: to make it feel like home for anyone who stepped inside.
translation.es: con que todo el que entrara se sintiera como en su casa.

translation.en: Whatever I do in my life, wherever I go,
translation.es: Haga lo que haga y vaya adonde vaya,

translation.en: Charlie's Kitchen will always hold a special place in my heart.
translation.es: La cocina de Charlie siempre será especial para mí.

translation.en: They didn't ask anything because they know you're the winner.
translation.es: No te preguntaron nada porque saben que ganaste.

translation.en: We'll see.
How many finished paintings do you have not hanging in the restaurant?
translation.es: ¿Cuántos cuadros tienes sin colgar en el restaurante?

translation.en: Hmm. That I'd want seen? Maybe over a dozen?
translation.es: ¿Que quisiera exhibir? Más de una docena.

translation.en: Then you have enough to have your own showing.
translation.es: Suficientes para hacer tu propia muestra.

translation.en: Would that make you happy?
I know the owner here.
That would be a dream come true.
But what about you? We could show our art together.
Well… you're my dream come true.
translation.es: Bueno… tú eres mi sueño hecho realidad.

translation.en: But I'd love that.
The results are in.
All right, before I announce the winner,
translation.es: Muy bien, antes de anunciar quién ganó,

translation.en: I just want to acknowledge all of the incredible talents
over at Charlie's Kitchen who've stepped up for us this entire Christmas week.
translation.es: de La casa de Charlie, que nos apoyó durante toda la semana.

translation.en: Let's give them a big round of applause.
And now, without further ado,
the winner of this year's Christmas art competition is…
translation.es: por el concurso de arte navideño de este año…

translation.en: With a remarkable personal piece,
the award goes to…
Charlotte Williams!
I thought for sure you were gonna win. I didn't enter the drawing.
translation.es: - Estaba segura de que ganarías tú. - No inscribí mi obra.

translation.en: Too personal.
Besides, it's yours, not mine, to enter.
translation.es: Además, el cuadro es tuyo. Tú decides.

translation.en: I don't know what to say.
I do.
Thank you for all the flavor you add to my life.
translation.es: Gracias por todo el sabor que le diste a mi vida.

translation.en: - Okay, you win. -
Oh, I know. I have you.
translation.es: Lo sé, porque te tengo a ti.

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Charlotte.
Merry Christmas, Wyatt.
